channel.title: ASP.NET MVC on Ian's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in ASP.NET MVC on Ian's Blog

item.title: Precompiled Razor Views
item.description: Precompiled Razor Views - Sitecore 9 - Issue 192470 & 119596 There are already some posts on this topic of using Precompiled Razor Views, so I won’t duplicate that content. Kam’s blog - Precompiled Views supported by Sitecore since Sitecore 8.2 Jeremy’s blog - possible side affect of Precompiled Views Chris’s blog - Slow compilation when using MVC areas/Helix folder structure Matt’s blog - ensuring your razor view paths are unique
